articles.title: ZoukOut Singapore returns to Sentosa in December after three-year hiatus - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Held at Siloso Beach across two days (Dec 2 and 3), this 2022 edition is organised by Zouk Group, in a first-time partnership with AEG, producers of world-renowned Coachella.
articles.content:
ZoukOut first started out 22 years ago in Singapore with 8,000 party attendees and grew to a peak of 50,000 festival goers in 2014.
